title: Update a Job Description
description: A manager needs to update the job description for a role on their team to reflect new responsibilities.

tasks.description: Receive the requested changes to the job description from the manager.
tasks.expected_outcome: HRBP receives the updated text for the job description.

tasks.description: Review the changes to ensure they don't impact the job's classification (e.g., exempt/non-exempt status).
tasks.expected_outcome: HRBP reviews the changes and confirms the FLSA classification is still correct.

tasks.description: Update the official job description in the HRIS job catalog.
tasks.expected_outcome: HRBP successfully updates the job description document in the system.
